product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 3.5 Knife - Special Buy
long_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 3.5 Knife features a tough 3mm-thick (0.12 in.) blade that will stand up to rugged use on camping trips. The titanium-coated hardened 440C steel blade is rust resistant, and it holds a sharp edge. Serrations on the blade come in handy when you're cutting rope. 3.4 in. long blade easily handles small jobs and emergency use. Bead-blasted texture on the high-density thermoplastic rubber handle offers a secure grip in all weather conditions. Carabiner clip handle extension lets you keep the knife clipped nearby for quick access. Special buy.
short_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies SaberCut Folder 3.5 Knife features a tough 3mm-thick (0.12 in.) blade that will stand up to rugged use on camping trips.
